name: pinstripe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a usually dark cloth with a pattern of narrow, usually pale, parallel lines: He was wearing a pinstripe suit.
klikk/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages pinstripes [ plural ]
suits made of pinstriped cloth: She watched the businessmen walk past in their pinstripes.

Add to word list
a narrow line of a light color in the design of a cloth, or the cloth itself with such parallel lines: a dark blue suit and pants with gray pinstripes pin-striped adjective [ not gradable ] us

/ˈpɪnˌstrɑɪpt/ (also pin-stripe, us/ˈpɪnˌstrɑɪp/)
a pin-striped suit
